meanings.definition: A genus of fungi that cause plant diseases.
meanings.sent1: The farmer learned about septorias in his crops.
meanings.sent2: The gardener treated the septorias on the tomato plants.
meanings.sent3: The septorias in the garden played hide and seek with the plants.
meanings.sent4: The septorias spread through the field like whispers in the wind.
meanings.sent5: The bright red color of the septorias made them easy to spot on the leaves.

meanings.definition: A type of leaf spot disease caused by fungi in the genus Septoria.
meanings.sent1: The yellow spots on the leaves were a sign of septorias.
meanings.sent2: The farmer sprayed the plants to prevent septorias from spreading.
meanings.sent3: The septorias on the leaves seemed to be having a dance party.
meanings.sent4: The septorias covered the leaves like a blanket of sadness.
meanings.sent5: The septorias turned the green leaves into a canvas of disease.
